message:
ইংরেজী শ্লোগান ছড়িয়ে দিন ফেসবুক টুইটার সহ গোটা বিশ্বে

Long Live Islam,
Long Live Quran.

Islamic governance is a MUST for this Bengal.

“Why are the Islamists behind bars???”- Answer, O Awami brutes!!!

Wake up, Muslims!
And Join the “Long March” ahead.

Stop Killing Muslims

Stop Genocide In Bangladesh

Stop Genocide On Muslims

Stop Killing Muslims In Burma

Stop Killing Rohingay

Hey hey!
Ho ho!
So long Hasina...it's time to go!

Together!
United!
We'll never be defeated!

So long, Hasina!
It's time for you to beat it!

Stage is set, chants are ready.
Hasina, you shaking yet?
#BanglaSpring

Gvt must seat up and listen,
you try to kill off justice & democracy,
The Bengal Tiger will not sit by idly, millions gather

Hey World!
Join our
#March2Dhaka
on #6April!

Hey Fascist @sheikhhasina !
Your Game is Over!

Revolution in #Bangladesh ?
We dare to Dream!
We invite World to
Support #March2Dhaka
on #6April Against the
#FascstAwami!

Al-Jazeera!
You always Stand
Against the Fascism!
We have seen u in
#Egypt! in
#Tunisia!
We want u for
#Bangladesh!
